snippet: President Obama must ensure that new rules about minimum wages and overtime pay are not watered down.
abstract: Editorial urges Pres Obama to ensure that new Labor Department rules about minimum wages and overtime pay for home health care workers are not watered down before they are finalized.
lead_paragraph: President Obama must ensure that new rules about minimum wages and overtime pay are not watered down.

headline.print_headline: Keeping a Promise to Home Care Aides
headline.seo: Keeping a Promise to Home Care Aides
headline.main: Keeping a Promise to Home Care Aides
